div.h3: Residential Bulky Waste and Bulky Yard Waste Closure

div.p: As a result of the COVID-19 pandemic and in an effort to reduce exposure to RHRTS employees and the general public, effective Saturday, April 4, 2020, the Rose Hill Regional Transfer Station (RHRTS) will no longer be accepting residential bulky waste or bulky yard waste. Friday, April 3, 2020, will be the last day this waste will be accepted until further notice. Please see here for the complete Department of Public Services announcement.
